text: "Real Love" is a 1985 song by Dolly Parton featuring Kenny Rogers and is the title track to her 27th studio album Real Love. It went to number 1 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs and Canadian RPM Country Tracks charts. Unlike Islands in the Stream this one was not written by the Bee Gees. == References == Category:1985 songs Category:Country songs Category:Dolly Parton songs Category:Kenny Rogers songs
title: Real Love (Dolly Parton and Kenny Rogers song)
